metaphor.description: Figurative comparisons, similes, analogies — clarity, coherence, cliché avoidance

description/senses.description: Sensory detail — sight, sound, smell, taste, touch — specificity and grounding

diction.description: Word choice — precision, register, verb strength, avoiding inflation

imagery.description: Concrete images vs abstract labels — visual stability, picturable detail

abstraction.description: Abstract statements — earning their place, grounding generalizations, level management

rhythm.description: Sentence length variation, cadence, emphasis through brevity, matching energy

pacing.description: Information density per paragraph — slowing at key moments, speeding through routine

repetition.description: Intentional vs accidental repetition — echoing, variation, evolution over time

transitions.description: Shifts in time, place, perspective, or tone — clarity and smoothness of movement

voice.description: Narrative voice consistency — perspective limitations, personality, genre alignment

tone.description: Emotional register of a scene — establishing, sustaining, and shifting mood

register.description: Formality level — matching context, speaker, and audience; avoiding drift

authorial.description: Author presence — commentary, thematic explicitness, immersion maintenance

clarity.description: Comprehensibility — intentional vs accidental ambiguity, baseline readability

implication.description: Show vs tell — behavioral cues over labels, trusting the reader, knowing when to be direct

causality.description: Cause and effect — plausible motivations, earned outcomes, avoiding coincidence

scene.description: Scene construction — orientation, spatial awareness, ending with change or pressure

character.description: Character rendering — thought vs action balance, behavior under pressure, psychological progression

dialogue.description: Dialogue craft — subtext, natural speech, grounding with action beats

world.description: Worldbuilding — internal consistency, implied depth, natural revelation
